name: Grave Robber (itch)
description:
Description:
You are playing a Grave Robber robbing some graves, but your loot is cursed. The more cursed loot you have, the worse are the waves of enemy's.

Lore:
Time to dig up some graves. Whats the worst that can happen? It's not like these treasures are cursed? Right?

Controlls:
WSAD to move around
E to dig, when your on the soil of a grave
Left Mouse Button to attack

Future Plans/Updates:
I did run out of time during the Compo, but here are some things I'm going to add in my Post Jam Version:
-better Atmosphere (darker and more scary/spooky)
-more Enemy's
-actual loot instead of points only
-Sound
